name: Open to Self
description:
A humble platformer game made with love <3

This game was created as a passion project. It is free for anyone to play, but donations are appreciated. 

As of 8/23/2021, the latest versions of Google Chrome have issues with Godot's audio, resulting in choppy sound quality. If this is affecting you, please try another browser. 

Controls: 

- Pause with the ESC key

- You can figure out the rest. It's part of the experience ;)

Special thanks to Maddie Liu for the music. You can find her on Instagram: @oddity.mp3
